spell_tooltip.description: Primordial Wave summons a totem at your feet for 15 sec that increases the critical effect of damage and healing spells of all nearby allies within 46 yards by 15% for 15 sec.

Your Bloodlust spell now has a 60 sec. cooldown, but increases Haste by 20%, and only affects you and your friendly target when cast for 10 sec.

In addition, Bloodlust is no longer affected by Sated.

Unleash your Elemental Shield's energy on an enemy target:

Lightning Shield: Knocks them away.

Earth Shield: Roots them in place for 2 sec.

Water Shield: Summons a whirlpool for 6 sec, reducing damage and healing by 50% while they stand within it.

Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 214,769 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

Generates 8 Maelstrom.

Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 220,683 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

Generates 8 Maelstrom.

Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 218,437 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

Generates 8 Maelstrom.
Shift partially into the elemental planes, taking 40% less damage for 12 sec.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 143,050 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

Generates 2 Maelstrom per target hit.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 142,912 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

Generates 2 Maelstrom per target hit.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 141,475 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

Generates 2 Maelstrom per target hit.

Protects the target with an earthen shield, increasing your healing on them by 20% and healing them for 161,406 when they take damage. This heal can only occur once every 3 sec. Maximum 12 charges.

Earth Shield can only be placed on the Shaman and one other target at a time. The Shaman can have up to two Elemental Shields active on them.
Disrupts the target's concentration with a burst of wind, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 2 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Astral Shift by 30 sec.

Chills the target with frost, causing 157,185 Frost damage and reducing the target's movement speed by 50% for 6 sec.

Generates 3 Maelstrom.

Increases the number of Elemental Shields you can have active on yourself by 1.

You can have Earth Shield on yourself and one ally at the same time.
Increases all Fire and Frost damage you deal by 3%.
A gust of wind hurls you forward.
Maximum health increased by 10%, and while you are at full health, Reincarnation cools down 75% faster.

Summons a totem at the target location for 30 sec. The totem pulses every 2 sec, rooting all enemies within 9 yards for 8 sec. Enemies previously rooted by the totem instead suffer 50% movement speed reduction.
Purges the enemy target, removing 2 beneficial Magic effects.

Calls forth a Greater Earth Elemental to protect you and your allies for 1.2 min.

While this elemental is active, your maximum health is increased by 15%.
Healing from Healing Stream Totem reduces Fire, Frost, and Nature damage taken by 6% for 3 sec.
Summons a totem at your feet that shakes the ground around it for 13 sec, removing Fear, Charm and Sleep effects from party and raid members within 34 yards.
When your health is brought below 35%, you instantly heal for 20% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 45 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature spells and abilities by 4%.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 6%.
Transforms the enemy into a frog for 1 min. While hexed, the victim is incapacitated, and cannot attack or cast spells. Damage may cancel the effect. Limit 1. Only works on Humanoids and Beasts.
While you have an elemental active, your damage taken is reduced by 5%.
Calls upon the guidance of the spirits for 15 sec, permitting movement while casting Shaman spells. Castable while casting.

Calls down a bolt of lightning, dealing 14,928 Nature damage to all enemies within 10 yards, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 5 sec, and knocking them away from the Shaman. Usable while stunned.

Increases the radius of your totem effects by 15%.

Increases the duration of your Earthbind and Earthgrab Totems by 10 sec.

Increases the duration of your Healing Stream, Tremor, Poison Cleansing, and Wind Rush Totems by 3.0 sec.
The effects of your weapon and shield imbues are increased by 30%.
When you cast Spiritwalker's Grace, you become immune to Silence and Interrupt effects for 5 sec.
Grips the target in lightning, stunning and dealing 654,495 Nature damage over 5 sec while the target is lassoed. Can move while channeling.
Relocates your active totems to the specified location.
Reduces the cooldown of your totems by 6 sec.
Resets the cooldown of your most recently used totem with a base cooldown shorter than 3 minutes.
Your next healing or damaging Nature spell is instant cast and costs no mana.
Summons a totem at your feet that grants you an absorb shield preventing 3.3 million damage for 15 sec, and an additional 336,597 every 5 sec for 30 sec.
Instantly shocks the target with concussive force, causing 654,616 Nature damage.

Causes the earth within 8 yards of the target location to tremble and break, dealing 290,315 Physical damage over 6 sec and has a 5% chance to knock the enemy down. Multiple uses of Earthquake may overlap.

This spell is cast at a selected location.
Your damaging critical strikes deal 275% damage instead of the usual 200%.

Calls forth a Greater Fire Elemental to rain destruction on your enemies for 24 sec. 

While the Fire Elemental is active, Flame Shock deals damage 
33% faster, and newly applied Flame Shocks last 100% longer.
Increases the critical strike chance of Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning by 10%.
Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake have a 25% chance to refund all Maelstrom spent.

Casting Lightning Bolt, Lava Burst, or Chain Lightning has a chance to replace your next Frost Shock with Icefury, stacking up to 2 times.

 Icefury
Hurls frigid ice at the target, dealing 457,400 Frost damage and causing your next Frost Shock to deal 200% increased damage, damage 4 additional targets, and generate 7 additional Maelstrom.

Generates 12 Maelstrom.

Charge yourself with lightning, causing your next 2 Lightning Bolts to deal 150% more damage, and also causes your next 2 Lightning Bolts or Chain Lightnings to be instant cast and trigger an Elemental Overload on every target.
After casting Icefury, the next time you cast a damaging Nature and Fire spell, you additionally cast an Elemental Blast at your target at 60% effectiveness.

Increases your maximum Maelstrom by 50.

Increases Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake damage by 5%.
Elemental Fury increases critical strike damage by an additional 25%.
Casting Stormkeeper summons a powerful Lightning Elemental to fight by your side for 12 sec.
While Lightning Shield is active, your Nature damage dealt is increased by 8%.
Casting Lava Burst has a 60% chance to cause your next Lightning Bolt or Chain Lightning cast to trigger Elemental Overload an additional time, stacking up to 2 times.
Imbuing your weapon with Flametongue increases your Fire spell damage by 6.5% for 1 hour.
Increases the duration of your Elementals by 20%.
Increases Earth Shock and Earthquake damage by 8% and the stat bonuses granted by Elemental Blast by 25%.
Increases the damage dealt by your Elemental Overloads by 40%.
Flame Shock damage has a chance to generate 2 Maelstrom.
Reduces the cooldown of Flame Shock by 1.5 sec and Flame Shock deals damage 15% faster.

Reduces the Maelstrom cost of Earth Shock and Earthquake by 5.

Reduces the Maelstrom cost of Elemental Blast by 10.

Transform into a Flame Ascendant for 15 sec, instantly casting a Flame Shock and a 100% effectiveness Lava Burst at up to 6 nearby enemies.

While ascended, Elemental Overload damage is increased by 150% and spells affected by your Mastery: Elemental Overload cause 1 additional Elemental Overload.

Blast all targets affected by your Flame Shock within 45 yards with a Primordial Wave, dealing 838,686 Elemental damage, and granting you Lava Surge.

Generates 12 Maelstrom.

Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake can trigger your Mastery: Elemental Overload at 50% effectiveness.

Overloaded Earthquakes do not knock enemies down.
The cooldown of Ascendance is reduced by 60 sec.
Flame Shock damage increases the damage of your next Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, or Earthquake by 1.5%, stacking up to 10 times.
Primordial Wave grants you 10% Haste plus 4% for each additional targets blasted by Primordial Wave for 12 sec.

Each Maelstrom spent has a 0.12% chance to activate Ascendance for 6.0 sec.

 Ascendance
Transform into a Flame Ascendant for 15 sec, instantly casting a Flame Shock and a 100% effectiveness Lava Burst at up to 6 nearby enemies.

While ascended, Elemental Overload damage is increased by 150% and spells affected by your Mastery: Elemental Overload cause 1 additional Elemental Overload.
Your Earth, Fire, and Storm Elementals are drawn from primal elementals 80% more powerful than regular elementals, with additional abilities, and you gain direct control over them.

Summons a totem at the target location that erupts dealing 96,880 Fire damage and applying Flame Shock to 3 enemies within 9 yards. Continues hurling liquid magma at a random nearby target every 0.9 sec for 6 sec, dealing 46,911 Fire damage to all enemies within 9 yards.

Generates 8 Maelstrom.
Primordial Wave calls an Ancestor to your side for 6 sec. Whenever you cast a healing or damaging spell, the Ancestor will cast a similar spell.
Ancestors have a 20% chance to call another Ancestor for 6 sec when they depart.
Lightning Bolt, Lava Burst, Chain Lightning, Icefury, and Frost Shock casts have a 8% chance to call an Ancestor to your side for 6 sec.
Lava Burst gains an additional charge and deals 5% increased damage.
When an Ancestor is called, they reduce the cooldown of Fire Elemental and Storm Elemental by 5 sec.
Increases your maximum Maelstrom by 25.
Using spells with a cast time increases the duration of Spiritwalker's Grace and Spiritwalker's Aegis by 1 sec, up to a maximum of 4 sec.
Earth Shield has an additional 3 charges and heals you for 25% more.

Increases the damage of Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake by 15%.

Increases the healing of Healing Surge and Chain Heal by 15%.
When an Ancestor departs, they cast Elemental Blast at a nearby enemy.

Your next healing or damaging spell is instant, costs no mana, and deals 10% increased damage and healing.

If you know Nature's Swiftness, it is replaced by Ancestral Swiftness and causes Ancestral Swiftness to call an Ancestor to your side for 6 sec.

Lightning Rods take 10% of all damage you deal with Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning.
